# Celestial Bridges of Hope
## Scripture
"And I will make you a light to the Gentiles, and you will bring salvation to the ends of the earth." - Acts 13:47

## Reflection
As we gaze upon the night sky, we're reminded of the celestial bridges that connect us to the vastness of God's creation. Just as the stars and galaxies are linked by invisible pathways of light and gravity, our lives are intertwined with the lives of others across the globe. In the winter season, when the nights are longest and darkest, it's easy to feel disconnected and isolated. Yet, the scripture reminds us that we are called to be bridges of hope, carrying the light of salvation to those around us. Just as the morning star shines brightly in the darkness, our faith can be a beacon of guidance and comfort to those navigating life's challenges.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, help us to be celestial bridges of hope, connecting others to your love and light. As we look up at the starry sky, remind us of our role in your grand plan to bring salvation to the ends of the earth. Give us the courage to share our faith with others, and may our lives be a reflection of your glory, shining brightly in the darkness. May we be a source of comfort and guidance to those around us, and may your light shine through us, bridging the gaps between hearts and souls. Amen.
